content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_rate_code
AS 
SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
  FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'rate_code.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data', 
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
) 
WITH (
   jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX) 
) AS rate_code
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    rate_code_id TINYINT,
    rate_code VARCHAR(30)
);
